events.message: I received my order yesterday but I want to return it and get a refund because it doesn't meet my expectations.
The customer's request was classified under the refund category based on the request to return the product and get money back.
Support agent Maria has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return your order for a refund. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you want to return the product so we can process your refund smoothly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product wasn’t as described on your website and doesn’t fit my needs.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund once we receive the returned product. I will send you a prepaid return shipping label within the next hour.
Thanks, that sounds great. I appreciate the quick response and the prepaid label will make returning easy.
The return shipping label has been sent to your email. After you send back the product, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just checking in to see if you have returned the product and if the refund process has been completed to your satisfaction.
Yes, I returned the package yesterday and already received the refund. Thanks again for the excellent support!
We are glad to hear that your refund has been processed successfully. We are closing this case now. Please reach out if you need any further assistance.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your experience with our support team. Your feedback helps us improve.
